text: @RobynVinter 😫this was taken River Exe Cafe May Bank Holiday 2019. All sat lovely and close in a restaurant.We had got bus down to marina and a water taxi to the floating restaurant.  We had booked for last weekend . All so happy not knowing we wouldn't be there the next year due to covid19 https://t.co/ouCExruoZ3
